description: The throw-on fleece that'll replace your favorite sweatshirt, our Microchill™ Full Zip Jacket is perfect for temps that sway more cool than cold and destinations that sway more fun-core than hardcore. Made from 100% brushed recycled polyester, it wicks away sweat when roasting by the campfire and keeps you warm when searching for tidepools on the northern California coast. A style so classic, you could easily wear it every day—and since you'll want to, better make sure you have a bunch.
name: Mountain Hardwear Microchill Full Zip Jacket - Mens
